extends java.lang.Object

      • addLivePosition

        public void addLivePosition(ICompetitor competitor,
                   double lon,
                   double lat,
                   long timestamp)
        Description copied from interface: ILocalDataserver
        Adds a live position to the dataserver. This position will be sent if the application is subscribed to the competitor positions event using the live connection.
        Specified by:
        addLivePosition in interface ILocalDataserver
        Parameters:
        competitor - the competitor
        lon - the longitude
        lat - the latitude
        timestamp - the time stamp when this position is valid
